Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I really can't thank you enough for helping
me make my special cow feed.<sp:0:4:0>Why don't you bring me <clr:0000>three more
acorns<clr:ffff>? There'd be another bottle of
<clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff> in it for you.<sp:0:4:0>And that offer's not open to just anyone,
y'understand. Don't go telling tales, now.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Whew...<sp:5:0:0>sorry for the ruckus. I wasn't
expecting anybody else here.<sp:0:4:0>Welcome to Hateno Pasture. <sp:5:0:0>Feel free to
say hi to the cows, so long as you don't
rile 'em.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Thanks to your help, I got to mix more of
my special feed. I'm happy, the cows are
happy, everyone's happy.<sp:0:4:0>Oh, <sp:5:0:0>and if you bring me <clr:0000>three more
acorns<clr:ffff>, there'd be another bottle of
<clr:0000>fresh milk <clr:ffff>in it for you.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>Time was, you could find acorns all over
the ground in the forest out back.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Dadgum <clr:0000>squirrels<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Notice>Whoopsie! Sorry, but I do need three
acorns and no less.<sp:0:4:0>I'd be happy to set you up with some
<clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff>. Just as soon as you bring me
<clr:0000>three<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>acorns<clr:ffff>.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>That's three acorns, sure enough. Here
you go! Our special-brand fresh milk.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Thanks, wanderer. Any ol' time you wanna
bring me some acorns, I'd appreciate it.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Well, if it isn't Acorn Boy! Round this
farm, you're a VIP, far as I'm concerned.<sp:0:4:0>Here to trade three acorns for a bottle
of our fresh milk again?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Whoopsie! Your pouch is full. You've got
all you can carry, looks like.<sp:0:4:0>I'll keep this fresh milk for you while you
make some space for it.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, you interested in trading three acorns
for our fresh milk again?
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyways... You here to trade <clr:0000>three acorns<clr:ffff>
for our <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff> again?
